SKU410850.Name: Walnut Pool Table - Black Felt
SKU410850.Description: Whether eyeing an eight-ball or admiring from afar, you and your guests won't be able to take your gaze off of this artisan-crafted pool table.  Made for us exclusively by American Heritage Billiards, this pool table spares no detail in bringing you the ultimate game of pool in a clean, modern design you'll treasure for years. Everything's included to get the game going, including six cues, heirloom balls, ball rack, chalk, wall rack and a fascinating playing guide reprint from the vintage 1970 International Tournament Pool Game Rules, Shooting Basics and Cue & Table Care Books.
Features: Solid American black walnut rails; custom sights on each rail are contrasting deep bronze
Slate bed and cross-laminated beam construction
Wool-blend, Teflon™-coated felt top in black
Legs crafted of American black walnut veneers and engineered wood for moisture control
Rubber bumpers
Leather drop pockets are dyed black
Includes 4 57\" 2-piece cue sticks, 1 48\" 2-piece cue stick and 1 bridge cue with brass bridge head
Heirloom pool table balls
15-ball wood triangle and 9-ball diamond ball racks
Training ball
Box of Sure-Shot chalk
Pool table and under-rail brush
Black hardwood wall rack for 8 cues
Cue repair kit
Tally balls and tally ball shaker
Marine-grade Naugahyde table cover
Playing guide is reprint of vintage 1970 international tournament rules, shooting basics and care instructions
Meets Billiards Congress of America tournament standards
Founded in 1987 outside Cleveland, Ohio, American Heritage Billiards is the world's leading game room furniture manufacturer

American Heritage Billiards handles the delivery of the order through a specialized carrier into your garage or other covered area. After delivery, a professional technician will work with you to set up an appointment to move the pool table to your room of choice and professionally install it
American Heritage Billiards will contact customers directly to arrange delivery and assembly.
American Heritage Billiards can hold the shipment for your convenience if this item is for a future project
Customer Service will direct pool table inquiries to American Heritage Billiards
Made in Ohio, USA of domestic and imported materials
See product label or call customer service for additional details on product content

SKU410843.Name: Walnut Pool Table with Table Tennis Kit - Grey Felt
SKU410843.Description: Whether eyeing an eight-ball or admiring from afar, you and your guests won't be able to take your gaze off of this artisan-crafted pool table. Made for us exclusively by American Heritage Billiards, this pool table spares no detail in bringing you the ultimate game of pool in a clean, modern design you'll treasure for years.Everything's included to get the game going, including six cues, heirloom balls, ball rack, chalk, wall rack and a fascinating playing guide reprint from the vintage 1970 International Tournament Pool Game Rules, Shooting Basics and Cue & Table Care Books. To expand your game options, we've included a kit that converts the pool table surface for tournament-sized table tennis for four. The net easily affixes to the table rails with felt-padded, heavy-duty clamps.

Dimentions.productName: Walnut Pool Table with Table Tennis Kit - Grey Felt

Features: Solid American black walnut rails; custom sights on each rail are contrasting deep bronze
Slate bed and cross-laminated beam construction
Wool-blend, Teflon™-coated felt top in grey
Legs crafted of American black walnut veneers and engineered wood for moisture control
Rubber bumpers
Leather drop pockets are dyed black
Includes 4 57\" 2-piece cue sticks, 1 48\" 2-piece cue stick and 1 bridge cue with brass bridge head
Heirloom pool table balls
15-ball wood triangle and 9-ball diamond ball racks
Training ball
Box of Sure-Shot chalk
Pool table and under-rail brush
Black hardwood wall rack for 8 cues
Cue repair kit
Tally balls and tally ball shaker
Marine-grade Naugahyde table cover
Playing guide is reprint of vintage 1970 international tournament rules, shooting basics and care instructions
Meets Billiards Congress of America tournament standards
Table tennis top is powdercoated steel and engineered wood with protective rubberized bottom
2-piece table tennis top easily assembles and disassembles for easy storage
Accessory kit contains 4 hardwood and rubber paddles, 4 balls, 2 Might-Grip clamps, 1 net and 2 anti-sag blocks
Founded in 1987 outside Cleveland, Ohio, American Heritage Billiards is the world's leading game room furniture manufacturer

American Heritage Billiards handles the delivery of the order through a specialized carrier into your garage or other covered area. After delivery, a professional technician will work with you to set up an appointment to move the pool table to your room of choice and professionally install it

SKU642141.Name: Tig Metal Counter Stool
SKU642141.Description: Named for a complex welding technique used to secure non-ferrous metals and copper alloys, our Tig bar stool revels in the contrast of raw metals and the intricate welds that are typically covered with an opaque topcoat.
Features: Iron rod and tubing with hand-welded brass
Acid wash bath finish and clear epoxy topcoat
Plastic feet
Made in India

SKU642166.Name: Tig Metal Bar Stool
SKU642166.Description: Named for a complex welding technique used to secure non-ferrous metals and copper alloys, our Tig bar stool revels in the contrast of raw metals and the intricate welds that are typically covered with an opaque topcoat.
Features: Iron rod and tubing with hand-welded brass
Acid wash bath finish and clear epoxy topcoat
Plastic feet
Made in India

SKU575912.Name: Delta Matte Black Counter Stool
SKU575912.Description: The Delta counter stool features straightforward styling in pure aluminum with a stylish matte black finish. Classic industrial and contemporary, the stool has a casual look that mixes well with metal, wood or glass furnishings.
Features: Hand-polished aluminum with matte black powdercoat finish
Sculpted seat
24\" seat height
Foot caps to protect floor surfaces
Made in China

SKU575955.Name: Delta Matte Black Bar Stool
SKU575955.Description: The Delta bar stool features straightforward styling in pure aluminum with a stylish matte black finish. Classic industrial and contemporary, the stool has a casual look that mixes well with metal, wood or glass furnishings.
Features: Hand-polished aluminum with matte black powdercoat finish
Sculpted seat
30\" seat height
Foot caps to protect floor surfaces
Made in China

SKU203992.Name: Galvin 48" Metal Top High Dining Table
SKU203992.Description: An artisanal pairing of wood and metal, Galvin offers an industrial look that still reads warm and clean. A galvanized zinc-treated top, crafted from lengths of steel mimicking traditional wood planks, rests on a solid mango base that shows off the wood's natural grain.

Dimentions.productName: Galvin 48" Metal Top High Dining Table

Features: Milled steel top hot-dipped in zinc with clear matte powdercoat finish
Solid mango wood legs with acrylic-based lacquer coat, hand finished with a rubbed wash wax finish
Naturally occurring grains and knots
Seats 4
Accommodates 24\" stools
Made in India

SKU482505.Name: Origin Backless Counter Stool
SKU482505.Description: Our Origin stool reveals and preserves the rings, knots and live edge of natural acacia wood that tells a unique story. Featuring a cross-section of wood for a seat, this organic, versatile stool pulls up to counters, bars or high-dining tables in high style. Sinuous bent iron rods curve a dynamic base to support the stool's wood top, which is coated with clear lacquer for shine and durability. Due to its organic nature, each wood seat will be unique and display its own natural characteristics. The Origin 18" Dining Stool is a Crate and Barrel exclusive.
Features: Acacia wood with clear lacquer topcoat
Rod iron base with matte black finish
Each piece is unique and will display characteristics of natural wood
Expansion and contraction of wood may occur
Seat diameter will vary slightly
Made in India

SKU482529.Name: Origin Bar Stool
SKU482529.Description: Our Origin stool reveals and preserves the rings, knots and live edge of natural acacia wood that tells a unique story. Featuring a cross-section of wood for a seat, this organic, versatile stool pulls up to counters, bars or high-dining tables in high style. Sinuous bent iron rods curve a dynamic base to support the stool's wood top, which is coated with clear lacquer for shine and durability. Due to its organic nature, each wood seat will be unique and display its own natural characteristics. The Origin 18" Dining Stool is a Crate and Barrel exclusive.
Features: Acacia wood with clear lacquer topcoat
Rod iron base with matte black finish
Each piece is unique and will display characteristics of natural wood
Expansion and contraction of wood may occur
Seat diameter will vary slightly
Made in India

SKU207950.Name: Clive Bar Cabinet
SKU207950.Description: Reclaimed peroba wood bar framed in iron reveals a walnut and antiqued mirror-clad cabinet, adding sparkle to bottled wine and spirits. Each piece will display unique characteristics, perhaps even flecks of paint from its previous life. A drop-down shelf stores glassware under the cabinet's top display shelf. Two lower cabinet doors conceal a stemware rack and two reversible shelves for horizontal bottle storage or general storage and ample space for additional bar essentials. The Clive Bar Cabinet is a Crate and Barrel exclusive.
Features: Solid reclaimed peroba wood side panels and front finished with a light sealer
Engineered wood top, back panels and shelves with walnut veneer and lacquer finish
Center cabinet interior is antiqued mirror
Iron tube frame with black finish
Levelers
Made in Vietnam

SKU672566.Name: Revolve 48" Round Adjustable Height Dining Table
SKU672566.Description: Our Revolve adjustable dining table puts a new spin on versatility, adjusting in height with a few turns to accommodate dining chairs, counter stools and bar stools. Perfect for all occasions, from everyday meals to pub-style high dining, this ingenious round pedestal table has an industrial feel, revolving a solid acacia table top around a threaded center metal support that's anchored by a substantial acacia wood base.

Dimentions.productName: Revolve 48" Round Adjustable Height Dining Table

Features: Solid acacia wood top
Metal pedestal base covered with acacia wood
3 pre-set heights
Accommodates dining chairs at 29.5\" setting, counter stools at 36\" setting and bar stools at 42\" setting
Made in India

SKU662845.Name: Elston Swivel Bar Stool
SKU662845.Description: Handworked metal rods engineer an open, architectural framework for Elston's beautifully grained mango wood. Grouped around a bar, the chair-shaped stool structures the perfect balance between form and function.
Features: Handcrafted welded metal frame with java finish
Mango wood seat and back with walnut stain and clear lacquer top coat
Mango wood arm and foot rests with walnut stain and clear lacquer top coat
Made in Indonesia

SKU556470.Name: Marin Shiitake Large Bar/Media Cabinet
SKU556470.Description: Centuries of traditional craftsmanship meet mid-century modern in a minimalist classic. Handcrafted of weathered solid elm with traditional wood-on-wood joinery—without the use of nails or screws—this contemporary collection combines generous media storage with striking clean lines.
Features: Solid elm with a shiitake stain and tung tree oil exterior finish and water-based interior finish
Traditional wood-on-wood joinery
Solid wood shelves and drawer levelers
Bar side has two fixed and four adjustable shelves, hanging rack and built-in shelves on the doors
Media side has three adjustable shelves
Steel handles
Anti-tip hardware included
Made in China

SKU575939.Name: Delta Brass Counter Stool
SKU575939.Description: The Delta counter stool features straightforward styling in pure aluminum with a smart brushed brass finish. Classic industrial and contemporary, the stool has a casual look that mixes well with metal, wood or glass furnishings.
Features: Hand-polished aluminum with electroplated brushed brass finish
Sculpted seat
24\" seat height
Foot caps to protect floor surfaces
Made in China

SKU575988.Description: The Delta bar stool features straightforward styling in pure aluminum with a smart brushed brass finish. Classic industrial and contemporary, the stool has a casual look that mixes well with metal, wood or glass furnishings.
Features: Hand-polished aluminum with electroplated brushed brass finish

SKU554189.Name: Maxine Bar Cabinet
SKU554189.Description: Parquet panels piece together gorgeous grain and color in this walnut bar cabinet that's ready to roll about the room for instant entertaining. With a flip and pull of the clean-styled brass hardware, the bar is open for business. Finished on all four sides, Maxine can float in a room. Its wood top folds out to an expanded work surface inset with black laminate. The interior is well equipped with racks for stemware, shelves for beverage bottles and a lower rack for 16 wine bottles. Open shelves and drawer box hold bar tools, ice buckets and supplies. There's even a removable drink tray to deliver the goods. The Maxine Bar Cabinet is a Crate and Barrel exclusive.
Features: Walnut veneer, engineered wood and black laminate
Brass hardware
Dovetailed drawer box with wood-on-wood glides
Top fold-out panels should not be left open without support underneath from swing-out doors
Two fixed shelves
Door shelves
Door storage capacity is 30 lbs. max per door - to maintain proper alignment of doors, evenly distribute weight in each door
Wine rack
Stemware racks
Concealed casters
Made in The Philippines

SKU194906.Name: Cody Upholstered Counter Stool
SKU194906.Description: Cody receives your guests with all the generous proportions and comfort of a fully upholstered dining chair, but keeps the room light and airy with its open back design and minimal lines.
Features: Certified sustainable hardwood frame with grey finish
Synthetic webbing suspension
Plant-based foam tight seat and back cushions
24\"H seat sized for counters
Made in North Carolina, USA

SKU194936.Description: Cody bar stools receive your guests with all the generous proportions and comfort of a fully upholstered chair, but keeps the room light and airy with its open back design and minimal lines.

SKU651824.Name: Parker Spirits Bourbon Cabinet
SKU651824.Description: There's more than meets the eye in this compact entertainment bar. Parker's drop-down front and two top leaves open to a full-service bar with plenty of room to fix and serve drinks as well as store bottles and supplies. Crafted of solid birch, ash and ash veneer, the bar has a warm brown finish the color of bourbon. Its finished back allows Parker to be at the center of the party, positioning anywhere in the room. In addition to the drop-down and flip-out serving surfaces, the bar has a drawer for tools, 18-bottle wine rack and side shelves (three on the left, two on the right) to store stemware or bottles as well as a recessed area in the back of the bar's interior to store taller bottles. Slim antique brass-finished hardware serves as guardrails on the side and pulls in front. The Parker Spirits Bourbon Cabinet is a Crate and Barrel exclusive.
Features: Solid birch, solid ash and ash veneer, engineered wood with bourbon lacquer finish
Brushed antique brass-finish hardware
18-bottle wine rack
5 side shelves
Drawer
Made in China

SKU575948.Name: Delta Mirror Counter Stool
SKU575948.Description: The Delta counter stool features straightforward styling in pure stainless steel with a shiny mirror finish. Classic industrial and contemporary, the stool has a casual look that mixes well with metal, wood or glass furnishings.
Features: Hand-polished stainless steel with electroplated brushed brass finish
Sculpted seat
24\" seat height

SKU455662.Name: Cantina Bar Cabinet
SKU455662.Description: Cantina' sleek design puts the focus on the exceptional beauty and unique character of teak, reclaimed, restored and repurposed as the bar cabinet's sleek, minimalist doors.  A mix of materials adds to its natural appeal, framing the bar in solid mango wood and topping the gallery shelf with a removable slab of white Banswara marble. Inside, Cantina fills all your party needs with six integrated stemware racks and plenty of space for barware essentials. Reversible shelves provide a flat surface for storage and a battened side to keep up to 16 bottles in place. A small drawer stores bar tools and cocktail napkins. The Cantina Bar Cabinet is a Crate and Barrel exclusive.
Features: Recycled teak doors and mango wood and engineered wood frame
Banswara marble top
Iron legs
Storage for 16 bottles
Stemware rack
Made in India

SKU575929.Description: The Delta counter stool features straightforward styling in pure aluminum with a smart brushed nickel finish. Classic industrial and contemporary, the stool has a casual look that mixes well with metal, wood or glass furnishings.

SKU575965.Description: The Delta bar stool features straightforward styling in pure aluminum with a smart brushed nickel finish. Classic industrial and contemporary, the stool has a casual look that mixes well with metal, wood or glass furnishings.
Features: Hand-polished aluminum with electroplated brushed nickel finish

SKU462033.Name: Spin Swivel Backless Counter Stool
SKU462033.Description: This contemporary brushed aluminum counter stool pulls up to the kitchen counter with the classic 360-degree spin, with ball bearing action for a smooth ride.
Features: Traditional base design with foot rungs
Foot caps to protect floor surfaces
Clear lacquer finish
Caution:  Do not place fingers or hands beneath stool seat as there are moving parts and edges may be sharp.
Made in China

SKU462053.Name: Spin Swivel Backless Bar Stool
SKU462053.Description: This industrial, contemporary brushed aluminum bar stool has a bar-appropriate height and offers the classic 360-degree spin, with ball bearing action for a smooth ride.
Features: Traditional base design with foot rungs
Foot caps to protect floor surfaces
Clear lacquer finish
Caution:  Do not place fingers or hands beneath stool seat as there are moving parts and edges may be sharp.

SKU449496.Name: Marin Shiitake Bar Cabinet
SKU449496.Description: Centuries of traditional craftsmanship meet mid-century modern in a minimalist classic. Crafted of solid elm with traditional wood-on-wood joinery—without the use of nails or screws—this contemporary collection combines generous media storage with striking clean lines. Stained shiitake, the wood is treated to a multi-step tung tree oil finish, a natural oil derived from the seeds of the tung tree nut, to bring out the sweeping grain and preserve the beauty of the wood. Each door with solid steel pulls features built-in storage for bottles and barware. Inside is one fixed and one adjustable shelf, three adjustable shelves for wine bottles, a small storage drawer and hanging racks for stemware. The Marin Shiitake Bar Cabinet is a Crate and Barrel exclusive.
Features: Solid elm with shiitake stain
Traditional wood-on-wood joinery
Solid wood shelves
Tung tree oil exterior finish, water-based interior finish
Five shelves (one fixed, one adjustable, three adjustable wine)
Steel handles
Levelers
Made in China

SKU653946.Name: Walnut Pool Table with Table Tennis Kit - Khaki Felt
SKU653946.Description: Whether eyeing an eight-ball or admiring from afar, you and your guests won't be able to take your gaze off of this artisan-crafted pool table. Made for us exclusively by American Heritage Billiards, this pool table spares no detail in bringing you the ultimate game of pool in a clean, modern design you'll treasure for years.Everything's included to get the game going, including six cues, heirloom balls, ball rack, chalk, wall rack and a fascinating playing guide reprint from the vintage 1970 International Tournament Pool Game Rules, Shooting Basics and Cue & Table Care Books. To expand your game options, we've included a kit that converts the pool table surface for tournament-sized table tennis for four. The net easily affixes to the table rails with felt-padded, heavy-duty clamps.Crafted of beautifully grained American black walnut, this pool table is not only stunning visually, it is specially constructed to last and perform—made with thick slate and oversized, interlocking beams to keep the cabinet from warping or sagging. We've covered the table in Teflon-coated khaki felt and it features American Black Walnut rails with deep bronze sights and brown leather drop pockets.

Dimentions.productName: Walnut Pool Table with Table Tennis Kit - Khaki Felt

Features: Solid American black walnut rails; custom sights on each rail are contrasting deep bronze
Slate bed and cross-laminated beam construction
Wool-blend, Teflon™-coated felt top in khaki
Legs crafted of American black walnut veneers and engineered wood for moisture control
Rubber bumpers
Leather drop pockets are dyed custom brown
Includes 4 57\" 2-piece cue sticks, 1 48\" 2-piece cue stick and 1 bridge cue with brass bridge head
Heirloom pool table balls
15-ball wood triangle and 9-ball diamond ball racks
Training ball
Box of Sure-Shot chalk
Pool table and under-rail brush
Black hardwood wall rack for 8 cues
Cue repair kit
Tally balls and tally ball shaker
Marine-grade Naugahyde table cover
Playing guide is reprint of vintage 1970 international tournament rules, shooting basics and care instructions
Meets Billiards Congress of America tournament standards
Table tennis top is powdercoated steel and engineered wood with protective rubberized bottom
2-piece table tennis top easily assembles and disassembles for easy storage
Accessory kit contains 4 hardwood and rubber paddles, 4 balls, 2 Might-Grip clamps, 1 net and 2 anti-sag blocks
Founded in 1987 outside Cleveland, Ohio, American Heritage Billiards is the world's leading game room furniture manufacturer

American Heritage Billiards handles the delivery of the order through a specialized carrier into your garage or other covered area. After delivery, a professional technician will work with you to set up an appointment to move the pool table to your room of choice and professionally install it
